sentences: From soothing salves to potent poisons, Alchemists specialize in brewing potions. With an alembic, cauldron, mortar,and pestle an alchemist can create extraordinary concoctions.
An Alchemist can specialize an an apothecary, poisonmaster, or scientist.
Artificers of everyday tools, weaponry, armory, and even jewellery. Smelting, grinding, and using their forge are all everyday tasks for a blacksmith.
A blacksmith can specialize as a weaponmaster, armorer, or goldsmith.
A wright with dextrous hands, a woodworker bends and carves wood to make weapons, furniture, and other instruments. Woodwork consists of sawing, joining, and refining.
A woodworker can specialize as a bowyer, joiner, or luthier.
